text: Levan Saginashvili (born September 15, 1988), also known by his nickname "Georgian Hulk", is a Georgian professional arm-wrestler. Levan is 7 times World Arm-wrestling Champion (WAF), 6 times European arm-wrestling champion, Top 8 2019 winner and the World Cup 2017 winner. After winning the World Police and Fire Games Gold medal in arm-wrestling in 2013 Belfast, Northern Ireland, UK WPFG 2013 Results, he got the merit of the first degree by The Ministry of Internal Affairs of Georgia, 2013. 2018 was very successful year for the young arm wrestler, he won 3 major tournaments including EuroArm2018 EUROARM Results, the World Armwrestling Championship2018 WAF Official Results and Vendetta All Stars #50, Rumia, PolandVendetta All Stars 50 Results. ==Tournaments== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" width="100%" |- !Year !Tournament !Place !Hand
